promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young strong rabbit dark-type pokemon holding a amethyst sword. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Amethiskip, a a young strong rabbit dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Hammer Kick. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "dark" or "Amethiskip". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, rabbit-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: In shadowy crypts, this enigmatic hare-like creature dwells, harnessing Hammer Kick to skilfully ward off foes. Amethiskip's agile agility masks a sturdy spirit.
